mapper.select: select * from i_vip_level where levelName like '%${input}%'
select IFNULL(min(l.discountNum),10) maxCount from `i_vip_level` l where discountNum>#{discountNum}
select IFNULL(MAX(l.discountNum),0) minCount from `i_vip_level` l where discountNum<#{discountNum}
select IFNULL(MAX(l.maxNum),100) minCount from `i_vip_level` l where l.maxNum<=#{minNum}
select min(l.maxNum) maxCount from `i_vip_level` l where l.maxNum>#{minNum}
select MAX(l.minNum) minCount from `i_vip_level` l where l.minNum<#{maxNum}
select IFNULL(MIN(l.minNum),99999999) maxCount from `i_vip_level` l where l.minNum>=#{maxNum}
